completion.item: contains the DOM reference of the widget

Workaround for passing keyboard events to the widget with focus
Parameters: (Event) e - the event (gara.jswt.Widget) obj - the obj on which the event belongs to (gara.jswt.Control) control - the control to witch the event belongs

Adds a CSS class to the item
Parameters: (String) className - new class

Adds an eventlistener to the widget
Parameters: (String) eventType - the type of the event (Object) listener - the listener

Returns the CSS class names
Returns: the class name(s)

Returns application based data for this widget, or null if it has not been set
Returns: application based data

Returns the parent for this widget
Returns: the widgets parent

Returns the style for this widget
Returns: the style

Tests if there is a specified classname existent
Parameters: (String) the - class name to look for
Returns: wether there is this class or not

Removes a CSS class name from this item.
Parameters: (String) className - the class name that should be removed

Removes a listener from this item
Parameters: (String) eventType - the type of the event (Object) listener - the listener

Sets application based data for this widget
Parameters: (Object) data - your data for this widget
